name: LAMA LAND Demo - Chapter |
description:
You wake up today wanting to go on a trip to somewhere nice, so you watch tv and surprisingly there is a free spot open for a cruise to LAMA-LAND (The land of enchantment)

You decide to go to the cruise and once you are on the ship... Something happens... You actually are really tired from gathering all or your things and running to the cruise ship. So you take a nap and surprisingly you wake up in a 🏠... The LAMA-LAND HOUSE to be exact. You wonder what your doing there and look around to see where you are. There seems to be something fishy going on here.... Will you be the one to find out the mystery? 

*Disclaimer* THIS IS ONLY A DEMO, THIS IS NOT THE FULL GAME.

The full game will come out soon... Stay tuned
